title: IrAru karattAlum
sahitya:
IrAru karattAlum dArALamAi aruLai sOrAdu vArittarum pErALan muruga pirAn


anupallavi

  tIrA vinai aDiyArai mArAdu toDarum pOdu sOrAdavan sIraDiyai sErndAl uyyalAm


caraNam    kUrAna vEl tAngi kunru pala sIrOngak-kuDi koNDiDuvOnaik-kumbiDavE kUDiDum
 ErALamAna bhaktar ellOrum nADiDum pErAdaravaip-peruvAr perumidamum uruvAr
